site.create_your_store_title: Create your own online store with Shopify
site.powered_by_shopify_html: This shop will be powered by {{ shopify }}

accessibility.no_cookie_policy_settings_html: Cookies are not enabled in your browser. For more information on how to modify your browser settings or how to unblock, manage or filter cookies can be found in your browser’s help or through such websites as: www.allaboutcookies.org.
accessibility.no_cookie_intro_html: Only cookies necessary to make this store work are currently enabled. Optional reporting and analytics cookies can be enabled to help us improve it. Please read what we use them for and how you can change your settings.
accessibility.cookie_intro_html: Reporting and analytics cookies are currently enabled on this store. These cookies are enabled in addition to cookies necessary to make this store work. Please read what we use cookies for and how you can change your settings.
accessibility.cookie_intro_disabled_html: Only cookies necessary to make this store work are currently enabled. Optional reporting and analytics cookies can be enabled to help us improve this store. Please read what we use cookies for and how you can change your settings.
accessibility.cookie_settings_html:
Find out how to manage cookies with popular web browsers:

  • Google Chrome
  • Microsoft Edge
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Apple Safari

To find information relating to other browsers, visit the browser developer's website.
accessibility.necessary_title: Necessary for the store to function
accessibility.necessary_desc: These cookies are necessary for the store cart and checkout services to function. They do not collect any personally identifiable information.
accessibility.non_necessary_desc: These optional cookies allow measuring and tracking of visitors to help improve services and performance of the store. All information they collect is anonymized.
accessibility.third_party_desc: These cookies are set by another website domain by technology partners or external web services. Please visit respective domains for further details.
accessibility.cookies_function_prefer: Used to manage customer cookies preference
accessibility.cookies_function_login: Used in connection with customer login
accessibility.cookies_function_cart: Used in connection with shopping cart
accessibility.cookies_function_nav: Used in connection with navigation through store
accessibility.cookies_function_admin: Used in connection with access to admin

legal.accept_marketing: I want to receive newsletter emails
